title: When Riot first announced Rotation Queue. . . .
body:
And I waited eagerly for them to include Nemesis Draft. . . .

https://media.giphy.com/media/xf20D8HzvTQzu/giphy.gif

And waited. . . .

https://media.giphy.com/media/F77lbfwEAnYNG/giphy.gif

And waited. . . .

https://media.giphy.com/media/SmpV6sKa1vBxm/giphy.gif

Aaand waited. . . .

https://media.giphy.com/media/bCwB9W585jiYU/giphy.gif

And Poro King comes around again, with still no sign of Nemesis Draft. . . .

http://reactiongifs.me/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/jim-carrey-liar-liar-oh-come-on-angry-its-enough.gif

It just. . . .it just. . . .

https://media.giphy.com/media/5xtDarpSTEzMXF8TFNm/giphy.gif

replies.body: Black Market Brawlers FeelsBadMan

Nemesis draft was about giving the enemy champions that you thought were bad.  then you would get stomped by them because you realize those champs are actually useful.  it should be played.

also Doom bots.. where the hell are my doom bot matches... i like the tears.. i want the tears .. 
"i played the hardest mode and couldnt beat it.. boo hoo hoo... why is hard mode hard?"

My favorite part about nemesis draft was people deciding who was crap and who wasn't.  When one person thinks {{champion:34}} is crap, another person will thinks she's OP and say {{champion:421}} is worse and yet another person thinks she's OP cause of her healing and gives them {{champion:6}}. It made me realize just how little we know about what champs are truly the worst.
Anivia was always good (Aside from post-rework), she was just underplayed because well... She's kinda boring.

That's just it though, people might think that she's a good to give since she's so underplayed and it's a good chance that the person who gets her won't know what to do with her, but she just as easily could be that person's main.
Before there wasn't a good way know for sure, but with champ mastery and those lvl 6-7 taunts, we can now see just how badly we f**ked up on our picks XD
Once they figure out all the Coding for Doom Bots it should be back
so probably in the same patch as that replay system?
After the replay system, but before the Tribunal comes back up from maintenance.
Yeah i think that was the only game mode that was actually educating. :P
The glorious day I had an enemy picking me {{champion:43}} so I could go mid against their {{champion:28}}.
*Cough Cough* Nemesis Urf mode *Cough Cough*

Black market brawlers? Doombots? Nemisis draft? Please Riot!

No, here's that one stupid gamemode where everyone is Lee Sin on ARAM, YOU ALL LOVE THAT, RIGHT?
One for all is actually my favorite joke mode. It depends HEAVILY on which champs are picked, but playing on a team of 5 Tahm Kenches was one of the most fun times I've had playing this game.
Hes talking about Poro King

But unlike one for all, Black market brawlers, Doombots, AND nemesis draft still haven't shown up yet


Although I agree, One for all is the best

It's super fun I'm just tired of playing Fizz. Every game, everyone wants to be Fizz. Even though he's melee with no CC. 

Meanwhile, the enemy team gets to be crap like Fiddlesticks and we just get dominated and the next match someone nominates Fizz again.
Everyone is always Lee Sin on ARAM.

Wait, are you serious?

Nemesis draft is the most hated and most boring game mode. The proof of this is that it had a queue time as long as old dominion.

Lots of people didn't like the "for fun" mode where you can't just pick what's broken and steamroll through poor sods who try to have fun. For the rest of us - those who want for fun modes to actually be fun - yes please, I want Nemesis draft back.

"Fun" is pretty subjective. The only reason Riot should bring back a "fun" mode is if enough people actually enjoyed it enough to care if it comes back. Giving enemy players champs that you think are bad is the definition of anti-fun, and clearly not enough people enjoyed it to give Riot the incentive to bring it back.
The way I see it, there are 2 kinds of players. Those who think that learning is fun, and those that think that winning is fun.

I understand what you are saying, but you guys are such a small minority. So small in fact that Riot will not even consider it. If they bring back nemesis draft that's 1 week longer for Urf or another popular game mode that is gonna bring them a lot more money than the few people who play nemesis draft. From a business perspective there is no point for them to include it.

Never got to play a game of Doombots
really want a game of Doombots
What is Doom Bots? I heard its kinda like URF
Bots that bring you Doom while you have normal champs.
Doom sounds cool, be more specific on what it is

http://38.media.tumblr.com/60f0d99b987cab2acfac3cd488748528/tumblr_n8vv5aHl6B1to7jzio1_500.gif
http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/i7YGtxF1iGU/hqdefault.jpg

This should explain it

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8EcZj4CJHRs
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hnHMmLJeI40

> [{quoted}](name=LeachimKcorruts,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BWEJH2vT,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-05T15:12:15.093+0000)
>
> Never got to play a game of Doombots
> really want a game of Doombots

If I'm correct, riot had said it was a coding nightmare, and would be hard to try to bring back. The old one was apparently full of bugs too.
but then you would have more then the regulated amount of fun
Whats Nemesis Draft? Sounds badass

> [{quoted}](name=Voidrey,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BWEJH2vT,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-06-05T17:44:05.248+0000)
>
> Whats Nemesis Draft? Sounds badass

Basically, you pick the enemy's champion.
I can only imagine the amount of trolls who picked teemo or illaoi or zed for the enemy.
it was actually trying not to give an enemy an adc
Could you trade though? If you got Illaoi and an ally got Teemo, and you're a Teemo main, were you allowed to trade?
If I remember correctly yes, you could trade with your allies
Nemesis Draft was the worst Gamemode ever.
That's because of how long it was out. Sure you do nothing but play like the 40 worst champions in the game, but if it's only for a weekend, I think it would work.
Also where is Snowdown Showdown
o u mean enemy picks 5 support and you hate life mode
5 support teams are actually REALLY strong, believe it or not.
Janna ADC OP
it's really strong if you're bronze and don't know how to play the game

That's not true at all. I recently did a FEK nemesis draft and those teams were actually surprisingly strong.  And the teams consisted of people from Unranked to Diamond.  Obviously a team of nothing but supports wouldn't fare well against a team with a strong team comp, but that's hardly the case in Nemesis.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40EkVbNlACM
mediocre players beating trash players. nothing to see here
You must be like the next Challenjour LCS player. Look forward to seeing your debut at worlds.
And i look forward to you staying bronze
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fIOgfmfka5I
I loved Nemesis Draft there were so many come backs because there was no Zed who would kill everyone
